verses.name: Numbers 10:15
verses.text: And over the host of the tribe of the children of Issachar was Nethaneel the son of Zuar.

verses.name: Numbers 10:16
verses.text: And over the host of the tribe of the children of Zebulun was Eliab the son of Helon.

verses.name: Numbers 10:17
verses.text: And the tabernacle was taken down; and the sons of Gershon and the sons of Merari set forward, bearing the tabernacle.

verses.name: Numbers 10:18
verses.text: And the standard of the camp of Reuben set forward according to their armies: and over his host was Elizur the son of Shedeur.

verses.name: Numbers 10:19
verses.text: And over the host of the tribe of the children of Simeon was Shelumiel the son of Zurishaddai.
